thread.title: Medical Tracking Solutions, Inc., Expands Client Roster with AllianceMed, Spinal Simplicity
thread.title_full: Medical Tracking Solutions, Inc., Expands Client Roster with AllianceMed, Spinal Simplicity

author: admin
title: Medical Tracking Solutions, Inc., Expands Client Roster with AllianceMed, Spinal Simplicity
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Medical Tracking Solutions, Inc. 
JACKSONVILLE, Fla., Sept. 17, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Medical Tracking Solutions, Inc., developers of iTraycer, is pleased to announce the addition of two new companies, AllianceMed and Spinal Simplicity, to the MTS client roster. iTraycer is a comprehensive inventory management system that provides real-time tracking of medical devices and biologics - visible by part, lot, and serial numbers - from manufacturer to patient. 
AllianceMed ( www.alliancemedllc.com ), headquartered in Phoenix, AZ, is a third-party medical billing company offering concierge billing services to physicians, medical professionals, and facilities. Spinal Simplicity ( www.spinalsimplicity.com ) is headquartered in Overland Park, KS. The company is a medical device manufacturer that provides safe, minimally invasive solutions to treat complex spinal and orthopedic disorders. 
"AllianceMed was established to create a way for physicians to eliminate paperwork hassles and instead focus on delivering the best possible patient outcomes," said Dan Jacobelli, Director of Operations at AllianceMed. "We are excited to work with iTraycer, because it enhances our ability to streamline processes, reduce paperwork, and, most importantly, provide a cutting-edge solution to our network." 
"At Spinal Simplicity, our mission is to deliver revolutionary medical devices that provide value to patients, physicians, and payers. Incorporating iTraycer will enable us to enhance sales efficiency, inventory control, and financial accountability so that we can focus our capital on developing life-changing devices," said Jonathan Hess, Vice President of Business Development for Spinal Simplicity. 
"We eagerly welcome AllianceMed and Spinal Simplicity as MTS clients. While the companies are very different, both are capitalizing on the evolving medical device market and exploring new ways to streamline operations to meet demand. iTraycer offers a real-time, enterprise-wide platform that will enable them to provide better service to their clients while maximizing productivity," said Stephen D. Bradley, Chief Executive Officer of MTS. 
About Medical Tracking Solutions, Inc. Medical Tracking Solutions, a team of medical device industry experts, developed iTraycer to meet the day-to-day challenges of medical device companies. iTraycer is a comprehensive inventory management system that provides real-time tracking of medical devices and biologics - visible by part, lot, and serial numbers - from manufacturer to patient. The system's multifunctional software facilitates communication and collaboration across the enterprise and enables companies to make critical, fact-based decisions with real-time information. And, iTraycer ensures compliance by addressing the traceability requirements of Unique Device Identification (UDI) regulations. For more information, please contact MTS at 904.527.5300 or 888.805.7758, email sales@medicaltracking.com , or visit the website at www.medicaltracking.com .
